description: A component to listen for a notification.

context_key.info: The key of the context to listen for.

warnings.key_not_found: Context key '{key}' not found, returning empty data

errors.retrieval_failed: Failed to retrieve data for context key '{key}': {error}

logs.listening: Listening for data with context key: {key}
logs.data_retrieved: Successfully retrieved data from context key: {key}
